comments_since_last_sample.body:
Iran has already managed to stabilize Iraq and Syria and weaken ISIS. 

The US controlled the middle east with its allies Israel, Turkey and Iran until 1979, and Iran is still a 'natural ally' because of some shared interests (fight against sunni terrorism).
Of course, the US shouldn't meddle abroad.
And in within a decade, it can't,  because it became the USSR, a military power without the sustaining industrial foundation.
